name: The Heist (itch) (Max Campbell)
description:
A game where you try to steal treasure from a museum without getting caught by the police. Made for "Trijam 129" in 3 hours. I made this game to try out a new framework called p5.js for making web games.

Note: it seems in some cases for some reason the game will take a minute or two to load

Credits:

   Treasure - @SciGho

    Programming - Max Campbell
